comments.author: github-actions
comments.body: **Dignified Python**: Silent exception swallowing - use logging to diagnose failures. See exception-handling.md: never swallow exceptions silently even in optional operations.

comments.author: github-actions
comments.body:
Fixed in commit ce83209. Replaced bare `pass` with `logger.debug()` to log the exception at debug level, making failures diagnosable while keeping the behavior non-fatal.

_Addressed via `/erk:pr-address` at 2026-02-21 19:10 UTC_
